skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.GetDecontaminated
skill.description: To be decontaminated by a decontamination plot. Agent moves toward the given decontamination plot. Once it is reached, agent requests for decontamination. To be decontaminated, decontamination plot needs to be operated by specific units.

parameter.name: decontaminationPlot
parameter.description: The decontamination plot to use for decontamination.

link.name: getDecontaminated
link.description: To enact the decision of being decontaminated.

link.name: reach
link.description: To enact the decision to reach the decontamination plot.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when the agent has been decontaminated by the decontamination plot.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent when the agent cannot get decontaminated (the 'decontaminationPlot' parameter cannot be used by the agent to get decontaminated).
